mapper.select: select b.menu_id from wk_admin_role_menu as a inner join wk_admin_menu as b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id where a.role_id = #{roleId} and (b.parent_id in (SELECT menu_id FROM wk_admin_menu WHERE parent_id = #{parentId}) or b.parent_id = #{parentId})

select max(data_type) as data_type from wk_admin_role as a inner join wk_admin_user_role as b on a.role_id = b.role_id
inner join wk_admin_role_menu as c on a.role_id = c.role_id inner join wk_admin_menu AS d ON c.menu_id = d.menu_id inner join wk_admin_menu AS f ON f.menu_id = d.parent_id
where b.user_id = #{userId}
and (c.menu_id =#{menuId} OR f.menu_id =#{menuId})
ORDER BY data_type desc

SELECT k.data_type, k.menu_id, am.menu_name, am.parent_realm as realm FROM ( SELECT t.*, arm.menu_id FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT b.data_type, b.role_id FROM wk_admin_user_role AS a JOIN wk_admin_role AS b ON a.role_id = b.role_id and user_id =#{userId} ) t LEFT JOIN wk_admin_role_menu arm ON t.role_id = arm.role_id ) k INNER JOIN (SELECT x.*,y.realm as parent_realm from wk_admin_menu as x LEFT JOIN wk_admin_menu as y on x.parent_id = y.menu_id) am ON k.menu_id = am.menu_id WHERE 1=1
and am.parent_realm = #{realm} and am.realm = 'index'
ORDER BY k.data_type DESC
select role_id,role_name,remark from wk_admin_role where role_type in (5,6) and status = 1
